Package server

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
server.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
Contains the logic for communicating with the client over the objectinputstream and objectoutputstream.
Version:
1.0 3/2/2022
Author:
Mirco Ghadri, Ramza Josoph, Valeria Nafuna, Zakariya Omar, "Group 3"

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      closes server connection incase of an error or user disconnects close all sockets and streams to free resources

    • run

      public void run()
      The main run method for the server that enters into a continous loop to read the incoming stream once the client is connected. Its broadcasts the in stream to all the clients.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
